about_the_game:
Dark Age Gladiator is a dark fantasy world where you live as a gladiator fighting in the arena for wealth and fame.
The opponents are not limited to humans, but also include a variety of demons.
In addition to fighting in the arena, players can also receive requests to exterminate demons and search for various treasures in ancient ruins to gain wealth that cannot be obtained in the arena, as well as to explore unknown worlds.

As you continue to win as a gladiator, you may find yourself fighting not only against your own city, but also against gladiators from other cities. And in the end, you will make a name for yourself as the strongest gladiator in the empire.

Main Features

.

Extensive growth system

.In addition to improving a character's basic abilities through training, player gladiators can acquire various weapon proficiencies, various types of attack skills, etc., allowing them to develop a variety of unique strengths.

Various equipment to make the character stronger

.Gladiators can wear various types of weapons and armor, which not only change their appearance but also give them strength according to their weapons.
Some armors are finely crafted and some are magic-enhanced, and by wearing powerful equipment, gladiators are able to face even the strongest enemies.

Competing against a variety of gladiators

.Each of the gladiators you will face off against has a unique fighting style and ability, and you will be required to fight according to your opponent.
Find your opponents' openings and face off against powerful foes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains bloody battle scenes.
